definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: On the project homepage there is a full list of all newsgroups about Firebird (see below).
sentences.chinese: 查看項目主頁上的全部新聞組列表。

sentences.english: Until then, I'll see you on the newsgroups and online.
sentences.chinese: 到那時，我會在新聞組和網上與您交流。

sentences.english: Never post in chat rooms, news groups, or other public places.
sentences.chinese: 切勿張貼在聊天室，新聞組，或其他公共場所。

sentences.english: No blog comment spamming, no ping, no links within newsgroups.
sentences.chinese: 無博客評論垃圾郵件，沒有平，在新聞組中沒有鏈接。

sentences.english: This same principle applies for newsgroups and community forums.
sentences.chinese: 相同的原理適用於新聞組和社區論壇。

sentences.english: No links from guest books, within newsgroups, yahoo groups, CL sites.
sentences.chinese: 無論是從新聞組內留言簿鏈接，雅虎團體，發光網站。

sentences.english: I am a student of the Department of Adult and Continuing Education at NTNU.
sentences.chinese: 我是師範大學社會教育系新聞組的日本學生和田真子。
